data.shippingInformation:
Its best to choose a delivery date that is 2 days before your event. (reservations allowed 3 months in advance). For example, If you event is on Friday the 10th , order the dress to arrive on Wednesday the 8th. This way you have enough time to ask for a replacement should you change your mind. 

We also offer same day delivery in Delhi NCR region (email us at hello@Demo.com or call our customer care at +91 98101982xx ) 

After your event, call customer care at +91 98101982xx  and schedule the pick up. We'll take care of return and dry cleaning. Thats it!  You are done!
data.qualityAssurance:
Every item on Demo is curated and is a guaranteed original item. We work with the top fashion designers and reputed vendors in India and around the world, to make sure there are no fakes.  We take great deal of to trouble to validate the authenticity of our merchandise  before we make it available to you. 

In case you have questions, please write to us at hello@Demo.com or call our customer care at +91 98101982xx
